Package com.google.ads

Interface Summary
Ad An interface for all types of ads.
AdListener A simple interface for receiving notifications on the status of the ads.
 

Class Summary
AdRequest An AdRequest object contains information about the ad to fetch.
AdSize The different sizes of ads supported.
AdView The View that displays the ads.
InterstitialAd A class for full-screen interstitial ads.
 

Enum Summary
AdRequest.ErrorCode An enumeration of the various types of errors that might occur while fetching an ad.
AdRequest.Gender The gender of the user for targeting purposes.
